channel.title: Lua API Manual on darktable lua documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Lua API Manual on darktable lua documentation

item.title: Lua API Version
item.description: ðŸ”—Current API The Lua API version currently used in darktable 3.4 is 6.1.0. ðŸ”—Development API The Lua API is currently at version 6.2.1 in the development branch of darktable (currently 3.5). All changes for version 6.2.+ will be identified as such until version 6.2.+ is included in a darktable release.

item.title: attributes
item.description: This section documents various attributes used throughout the documentation. ðŸ”—write This object is a variable that can be written to. ðŸ”—has_tostring This object has a specific reimplementation of the “tostring” method that allows pretty-printing it. ðŸ”—implicit_yield This call will release the Lua lock while executing, thus allowing other Lua callbacks to run. ðŸ”—parent This object inherits some methods from another object. You can call the methods from the parent on the child object
